channel.title: Free and member quests problem
channel.description: Hey guys i am new to this and i want to make a local server with just my friends and I. I got 718 files setup and i am a quester i can't help but do quests for runescape xD. I got the 718 files set up online that all works but no quests work, i have tried numerous amount of versions such as 317...400 something 600 something. I did have Jolt's 666 but i couldn't get that to work it just times out. Is there an option where quests to be enabled? Or they were never there? If there is a client and source out there with quests please link. :(

item.title: Free and member quests problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

arham 4:

So that would mean you’re 14-ish right now? Cool, I’m 13.

It’s not good to lie Arham…
You’re 10

Read full topic

item.title: Free and member quests problem
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

718 servers don’t allow you to modify the quest tab or change text. The only way to change quest text is by finding the config and configuration values.

gofik123:

I guess it was 2010 then :S i was in year 9 and 10 xD ok thank you +1 for Limits (Not sure if this forum does that)

So that would mean you’re 14-ish right now? Cool, I’m 13.

Read full topic

item.title: Free and member quests problem
item.dc:creator: @gofik123 gofik123
item.description:
@gofik123 wrote:

Dam i was hoping to get back into rs and some questing cbf paying for members xD Thanks for replying. I am having trouble picking out source versions so far 718 is the most popular (Which i have (Rune-evo v3) but do you know which is the most stable and with less bugs? i’ve checked the compilation of servers in the forum in the downloads section and i am like i don’t know which one xD i am looking left and right at Matrix, rune evolution 742, i just can’t choose xD. Any recommendations?

Read full topic
